rules_text:
Vehicles you control have islandwalk.
Whenever a Vehicle or Spirit you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{3}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a flood counter on target land. It's an Island in addition to its other types. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely)[/i]
